players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch out! I'm Charlie, the mafioso. Stay cautious."
Diana: "Thanks Charlie, will be careful. Any tips for identifying mafia?"
You: "Charlie confirmed mafia. Look for alibis & inconsistencies."
Charlie: "Alibis matter, stay alert Bob. Charlie confirmed."
You: "Charlie confirmed mafia. Watch his alibis closely."
Diana: "Noted Bob, Charlie's mafia claim aligns. Watch out for Alice & Charlie's alibis."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
